select COUNT (*) from market.markrt_wx_plan_photo pp left join (select distinct (t.activity_id) activity_id, t.open_id, t.nick_name, t.avatar_url from market.market_wx_admin_info t) tt on tt.open_id = pp.openid and tt.activity_id = pp.activity_id left join market.market_tb_plan_activity p on tt.activity_id = p.id
and p.plan_id = #{planId} and p.id = #{id} and p.plan_title LIKE '%${planTitle}%' and p.plan_address LIKE '%${planAddress}%' and p.plan_start_date = #{planStartDate} and p.plan_end_date = #{planEndDate}
